resources.string: Make a friend. Find a date. Troll.

Cheddar pairs you with up to 4 other Northeastern students in a completely anonymous chat room. It\'s up to you to decide what you do and what you talk about. Make a new friend or maybe an enemy, ready?
Get paired with one other for a more intimate setting. Perfect for making new connections.
(Optional) Select your dorm and we\'ll try to match you with someone nearby.
Join the mayhem. Anything goes in this up to 5 person chat room. Warning: Not for the faint of heart.
Enter your husky email address and get exclusive features when Cheddar launches.
